Author: Timwi, Mickeylover, JαmεςH
Description: Solve other modules on the bomb for each of the Houses of Hogwarts. The calculate their point scores and determine which House wins the House Cup. Tags: banner, module name, parchment, scroll, Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, Slytherin
Name: Hogwarts

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask which module was solved for which House and/or how many points each House earned.
